title: Prerender
summary: Prerendering refers to the practice of speculatively prefetching and rendering pages that the user is likely to navigate to in the near future (the browser renders the page in the background in what is effectively an invisible separate tab). Prerendering includes downloading a document's subresources and running associated JavaScript.
